html: The challenges our state faces are many & great, but I believe we’re up to the task. I look forward to fighting alongside the Nevada Legislature, @GovSisolak & our constitutional officers to do right by Nevadans. Because when Nevadans have a fair shot at success, Nevada thrives.
text: The challenges our state faces are many & great, but I believe we’re up to the task. I look forward to fighting alongside the Nevada Legislature, @GovSisolak & our constitutional officers to do right by Nevadans. Because when Nevadans have a fair shot at success, Nevada thrives.

html: If working families in Nevada are to have a fair shot, we must address the lack of affordable housing. Affordable housing is key to providing stability and economic security for Nevada families, allowing them to build wealth and plan for the future.
text: If working families in Nevada are to have a fair shot, we must address the lack of affordable housing. Affordable housing is key to providing stability and economic security for Nevada families, allowing them to build wealth and plan for the future.

html: I recognize that rapid economic growth comes with growing pains for our state. That’s why we’re working together to find innovative solutions to one of Nevada’s greatest challenges: ensuring hardworking families in our state can afford to live in their communities.
text: I recognize that rapid economic growth comes with growing pains for our state. That’s why we’re working together to find innovative solutions to one of Nevada’s greatest challenges: ensuring hardworking families in our state can afford to live in their communities.

html: I’ve developed legislation & fought for opportunities that encourage the development of smart tech, expand access to broadband in underserved communities, and put guardrails in place to protect workers & ensure the responsible use of tech that continues to diversify our economy.
text: I’ve developed legislation & fought for opportunities that encourage the development of smart tech, expand access to broadband in underserved communities, and put guardrails in place to protect workers & ensure the responsible use of tech that continues to diversify our economy.

html: Nevada is a leader in innovation. In the Senate, I’ve introduced legislation that ensures we continue to see strong economic development and job creation for Nevadans. My agenda is based on what I’ve seen right here in Nevada. I call it the Innovation State Initiative.
text: Nevada is a leader in innovation. In the Senate, I’ve introduced legislation that ensures we continue to see strong economic development and job creation for Nevadans. My agenda is based on what I’ve seen right here in Nevada. I call it the Innovation State Initiative.

html: We’re working across all levels of gov't to address the root cause of natural disasters: climate change. Whether it’s strengthening partnerships to protect Tahoe or advancing renewable energy, we'll continue to prioritize conservation while creating good-paying jobs for Nevadans.
text: We’re working across all levels of gov't to address the root cause of natural disasters: climate change. Whether it’s strengthening partnerships to protect Tahoe or advancing renewable energy, we'll continue to prioritize conservation while creating good-paying jobs for Nevadans.

html: A healthy NV also means protecting our environment. There’s no better example of our collaboration than our unified response to the Admin’s decision to ship plutonium to the state. And when it comes to Yucca Mountain, we’ll continue working together to make sure it stays dead.
text: A healthy NV also means protecting our environment. There’s no better example of our collaboration than our unified response to the Admin’s decision to ship plutonium to the state. And when it comes to Yucca Mountain, we’ll continue working together to make sure it stays dead.

html: I’m committed to continuing to fight by your side to improve the Affordable Care Act and expand the number of health care options available to patients and families, especially in Nevada’s rural communities.
text: I’m committed to continuing to fight by your side to improve the Affordable Care Act and expand the number of health care options available to patients and families, especially in Nevada’s rural communities.

html: It’s our partnerships that can strengthen our state, keep us moving forward, and allow us to address the issues that matter most to Nevadans. We can build a healthier Nevada with greater opportunities for everyone. And it starts by listening.
text: It’s our partnerships that can strengthen our state, keep us moving forward, and allow us to address the issues that matter most to Nevadans. We can build a healthier Nevada with greater opportunities for everyone. And it starts by listening.

html: I’m proud to represent the first state with a female-majority legislature & Supreme Court; & one of just a handful of states to be represented by two women in the U.S. Senate. We understand that our diversity is our strength. We understand that we all win when we work together.
text: I’m proud to represent the first state with a female-majority legislature & Supreme Court; & one of just a handful of states to be represented by two women in the U.S. Senate. We understand that our diversity is our strength. We understand that we all win when we work together.

html: Nevadans, and all Americans, deserve a government that addresses the challenges confronting our nation. That's why I'll continue working with colleagues from both sides to do what we were sent here to do: find common ground to improve the lives of our constituents.

html: Ten years after the @Lilly_Ledbetter Fair Pay Act was signed into law by President Obama, I proudly cosponsored the #PaycheckFairness Act to strengthen our laws & bring us one step closer to finally closing the gender wage gap. #Ledbetter10

html: We can’t let this disparity, which is worse for women of color, continue to exist. The #PaycheckFairness Act would make necessary fixes to narrow the wage gap and ensure that American women earn a fair wage to support their families.
text: We can’t let this disparity, which is worse for women of color, continue to exist. The #PaycheckFairness Act would make necessary fixes to narrow the wage gap and ensure that American women earn a fair wage to support their families.

html: Equal pay for equal work means giving women the opportunity to achieve economic security and the ability to provide for their families. But in America, women still earn on average only about 80 percent of what men earn.
text: Equal pay for equal work means giving women the opportunity to achieve economic security and the ability to provide for their families. But in America, women still earn on average only about 80 percent of what men earn.

html: We should not be abdicating to the Executive Branch. We should be doing our job. Let’s open this government. Let’s show these federal workers that they aren’t political pawns.
text:
We should not be abdicating to the Executive Branch. We should be doing our job.
 
Let’s open this government. Let’s show these federal workers that they aren’t political pawns.

html: We know we can pass legislation to open the government. We did it in the last Congress. It’s the president’s decision whether to accept/veto. If he decides to veto it, we should override. The founders and framers set up a process so that no one branch of government has control.
text: We know we can pass legislation to open the government. We did it in the last Congress. It’s the president’s decision whether to accept/veto. If he decides to veto it, we should override. The founders and framers set up a process so that no one branch of government has control.

html: The shutdown is threatening wildlife and public safety because staff are furloughed and federal contractors aren’t getting paid. Important projects are delayed and services Nevadans rely on have been halted.
text: The shutdown is threatening wildlife and public safety because staff are furloughed and federal contractors aren’t getting paid. Important projects are delayed and services Nevadans rely on have been halted.

html: This is only one of the major impacts on Nevadans. It’s not the only major disruption we’re seeing. I spoke today with Nevadans who work at the BLM, U.S. Fish and Wildlife, U.S. Geological Survey and USDA Rural Development.
text: This is only one of the major impacts on Nevadans. It’s not the only major disruption we’re seeing. I spoke today with Nevadans who work at the BLM, U.S. Fish and Wildlife, U.S. Geological Survey and USDA Rural Development.

html: A single mom told me that she recently moved to Nevada after getting her dream job. She used her savings to move and buy a house. Without the certainty of a paycheck, she asked me, “how do I pay the bills, support my mother and my 8-year-old?”
text: A single mom told me that she recently moved to Nevada after getting her dream job. She used her savings to move and buy a house. Without the certainty of a paycheck, she asked me, “how do I pay the bills, support my mother and my 8-year-old?”

html: I spoke with parents who both work for the federal government and are not receiving any income. They have four children. Given the uncertainty of when the government will re-open, they have no idea how they could support their family without any pay.
text: I spoke with parents who both work for the federal government and are not receiving any income. They have four children. Given the uncertainty of when the government will re-open, they have no idea how they could support their family without any pay.

html: The consensus I heard from federal workers is simple: re-open the government. Thousands of Nevada’s federal workers are worried about paying the bills, supporting their children and keeping up with their mortgage payments.
text: The consensus I heard from federal workers is simple: re-open the government. Thousands of Nevada’s federal workers are worried about paying the bills, supporting their children and keeping up with their mortgage payments.

html: Before NV’s Medicaid expansion, rural communities struggled to find quality, affordable health care. If the ACA ruling takes effect, NV’s Medicaid expansion would be revoked, leaving many in our state without coverage. Let’s fight to protect our care from ACA sabotage.
text:
Before NV’s Medicaid expansion, rural communities struggled to find quality, affordable health care. If the ACA ruling takes effect, NV’s Medicaid expansion would be revoked, leaving many in our state without coverage. 

Let’s fight to protect our care from ACA sabotage.
